general: This morning, the heart and the ego may be at odds, dear Aquarius, as the Moon in Gemini, the Sun, and the nodes of fate align. If conflicts arise, take a moment to reflect on whether you are fighting for a good reason or simply being stubborn. Breaking away from your own patterns could inspire others to do the same, leading to significant changes in your relationships. From the afternoon onwards, joyful vibrations emerge thanks to the beautiful connections between the Moon, Mercury, and Venus. Don't hesitate to show a bit of your humorous edge to lighten the atmosphere. Your flirty side may also manifest today, and you will have the ability to enchant those who catch your attention.
love: Be open to light exchanges, it could rekindle the flame.
work: Collaborate with your colleagues, new ideas may emerge.
health: Take the time to relax and breathe deeply.
advice: Let your heart guide your interactions.
teaser: A day of discoveries and exchanges!
